{"id":865585626,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1672033783,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/865585626/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int token = 1;\n        vector<int> vis(26, 0);\n        int maxLen = 0;\n        int currLen = 0;\n        for(auto i:s){\n            if(vis[i - 'a'] != token){\n                vis[i - 'a']++;\n                currLen++;\n            }\n            else{\n                token++;\n                maxLen = max(maxLen, currLen);\n                currLen = 1;\n                vis[i-'a']++;\n            }\n        }\n        return maxLen;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
